00017         class TrackbackController extends EmeController
00018         {
00019                 function init()
00020                 {
00021                         $this->before_filter(array('block_ip', 'log_visit'));
00022                 }
00023                 
00028                 function diario()
00029                 {
00030                         if (!this->request->is_post())
00031                         {
00032                                 $this->redirect_to(array('controller' => 'diario', 'action' => 'read', 'id' => $_REQUEST['id']));
00033                         }
00034                         
00035                         $trackback = new TrackBack('Emeraldion Lodge .o. Diario', 'claudio');
00036                         
00037                         $pingback = new DiarioPingback();
00038 
00039                         $pingback->post_id = $trackback->get_id; // The id of the item being trackbacked
00040                         $pingback->url = $trackback->url; // The URL from which we got the trackback
00041                         $pingback->title = $trackback->title; // Subject/title send by trackback
00042                         $pingback->excerpt = $trackback->excerpt; // Short text send by trackback                       
00043                         
00044                         if ($pingback->save())
00045                         {
00046                                 // Logged successfully...
00047                                 echo $trackback->receive(TRUE);
00048                         }
00049                         else
00050                         {
00051                                 // Something went wrong...
00052                                 echo $trackback->receive(FALSE, l('Trackbacks are currently disabled'));
00053                         }
00054                         exit();
00055                 }
00056                 
00061                 public function software()
00062                 {
00063                         if (!this->request->is_post())
00064                         {
00065                                 $this->redirect_to(array('controller' => 'software', 'action' => 'show', 'id' => $_REQUEST['id']));
00066                         }
00067                         
00068                         $trackback = new TrackBack('Emeraldion Lodge .o. Software', 'claudio');
00069                         
00070                         $pingback = new SoftwarePingback();
00071 
00072                         $pingback->software_id = $trackback->get_id; // The id of the item being trackbacked
00073                         $pingback->url = $trackback->url; // The URL from which we got the trackback
00074                         $pingback->title = $trackback->title; // Subject/title send by trackback
00075                         $pingback->excerpt = $trackback->excerpt; // Short text send by trackback                       
00076                         
00077                         if ($pingback->save())
00078                         {
00079                                 // Logged successfully...
00080                                 echo $trackback->receive(TRUE);
00081                         }
00082                         else
00083                         {
00084                                 // Something went wrong...
00085                                 echo $trackback->receive(FALSE, l('Trackbacks are currently disabled'));
00086                         }
00087                         exit();
00088                 }
00089                 
00094                 protected function require_post()
00095                 {
00096                         if (!$this->request->is_post())
00097                         {
00098                                 HTTP::error(405, array('Allow', 'POST'));
00099                         }
00100                 }
00101         }
